description: Number of binary arrangements on n X n array without three adjacent 1's in a row or column.
references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 342-349.
links: S. R. Finch, Hard Square Entropy Constant
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: More terms from _R. H. Hardin_, Feb 02 2002
